name: #Aim4TheStars
description:
Made in less than 2 days during the TentacleZone GameJam @Payload Studios, the theme was "No upgrades, downgrades only".

#AimForTheStars is the ridiculous story of a media influencer going out to celebrate a big achievement, but remember, no upgrades, downgrades only.

Alessandro: Unity development & music

Lucy: Game Art

Satu: Writing

Shaun: Concept art and writing
